biotools.summary: PERCEPTRON is an open-source GPU-accelerated proteoform identification pipeline for top-down proteomics. PERCEPTRON is a freely available web-based proteoform identification pipeline for Top-Down Proteomics (TDP).

bioschemas.name: PERCEPTRON
